title: Can you pay someone to write your CV? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, there are resume writers like myself, who you can hire to help write your CV. But whether or not you really need a resume writer is the bigger question. There are times when I’ve told people they really don’t need one because I honestly felt it wasn’t necessary. But there are others who can benefit from having a professional helping out. And if you are thinking about paying somebody, make sure you check them out ahead of time! Sadly, there are some bad apples in the bunch who don’t know what they’re doing and will rip you off. So if you decide to hire somebody, check them out! Reputable ones will have no problem giving you a free review and/or samples of their work.
